title: Bug 18934: Scrollbars should be disabled in ImageAnalyzer example
description: When opening the ImageAnalyzer example, the scrollbars appear to be enabled and can be moved, but they do not have any effect on the image. This behavior is misleading, especially when opening a small image like an icon.
OB: The scrollbars in the ImageAnalyzer example are enabled and can be moved, but they have no effect on the image.
EB: The scrollbars in the ImageAnalyzer example should be disabled and not movable, as they currently do not have any effect on the image.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Build F2 (20020602)Redhat 7.2, GTK2KDE 2.210(GTK2 only).
2. Open the ImageAnalyzer example.
3. Notice that the scrollbars are enabled and can be moved, but they have no effect on the image.
